name: git-workflow
description: Production-ready slash commands for Git workflow automation including PR creation, release management, and QA testing

skills.name: start
skills.description: Create a feature branch from a ticket ID

skills.name: commit
skills.description: Stage and commit changes with proper formatting

skills.name: finish
skills.description: Create a pull request with comprehensive description

skills.name: release
skills.description: Create a release branch and PR to main

skills.name: release-notes
skills.description: Generate GitHub release with detailed notes

skills.name: plan-qa
skills.description: Generate QA test plan from ticket

skills.name: start-qa
skills.description: Execute QA tests from plan file

agents.name: pr-reviewer
agents.description: Expert code reviewer for quality, security, and best practices

agents.name: release-validator
agents.description: Validates release readiness by checking tests, build, and dependencies

agents.name: qa-executor
agents.description: Executes QA test plans with detailed reporting
